fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance professionalism and readability for a resume/CV. It combines classic serif and sans-serif fonts for a timeless look.
fontTheory.readability: The serif body text enhances readability, especially for longer sections, while the sans-serif headings and titles provide clear hierarchy and visual appeal.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The hierarchy is established through font sizes, weights, and styles. Headings are larger and bold, while body text is medium weight for easy reading.
fontTheory.fontPairings: The pairing of Georgia for body text and Arial for headings creates a harmonious contrast, with Courier New for code blocks ensuring clarity and distinction.
